keyMoments.title: Nuru Challenges Zoro
keyMoments.description: Nuru, an angler fish-man swordsman, challenges Zoro claiming he wants to become the strongest swordsman of Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Anime-original character introduction serving as a preliminary opponent for Zoro.

keyMoments.title: Nuru Defeated by Zoro and Hyouzou
keyMoments.description: After being defeated by Zoro, Nuru receives a finishing blow from the steroid-enhanced Hyouzou.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates both Zoro's skill and Hyouzou's indiscriminate violence while drugged.

abilities.description: Nuru can use the lightbulb on his forehead to blind opponents.
Wields a large shotel in combat.

reveals.information: Wants to become the strongest swordsman of Fish-Man Island

notes: Anime-original character not present in the manga. Serves as a warm-up opponent for Zoro before his battle with Hyouzou.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Snake Shot Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts his new post-timeskip technique Gomu Gomu no Snake Shot, hitting Hody with a swerving snake-like punch that breaks his rib and forces him to release Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.significance: First use of this animal-themed post-timeskip technique.

keyMoments.title: Luffy vs. Hody Begins
keyMoments.description: Luffy begins his direct confrontation with Hody Jones in underwater combat.
keyMoments.significance: The main battle of the arc begins between protagonist and antagonist.

abilities.description: Luffy launches his arm in a swerving snake-like movement to strike the enemy with an open hand, gripping hard enough to cause pain and damage.

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Defeats Vander Decken
keyMoments.description: Hody pulls his trident from Vander Decken's body after defeating his former ally.
keyMoments.significance: Eliminates Decken as a factor and shows Hody's ruthlessness toward former allies.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Shirahoshi and Her Brothers
keyMoments.description: Hody slices through Ryuboshi and Manboshi and captures Shirahoshi by her hair using his incredible underwater speed.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hody's enhanced abilities and creates a critical danger moment.

keyMoments.title: Energy Steroid Overdose Transformation
keyMoments.description: Hyouzou consumes too many Energy Steroids while drunk, causing a complete physical transformation that dramatically increases his power.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the dramatic enhancement and dangers of Energy Steroid abuse.

keyMoments.title: Chidoriashi Hash Debut
keyMoments.description: Uses his Eight Sword Style technique to cut through multiple opponents including his own allies.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates his exponentially increased power after steroid overdose.

abilities.description: Hyouzou swings his eight swords against opponents while drunk and enhanced by Energy Steroids, strong enough to cut through iron shields.

reveals.information: Energy Steroid overdose causes physical transformation and extreme power enhancement

keyMoments.title: Fights Anime-Original Character Nuru
keyMoments.description: Zoro is challenged by Nuru, an angler fish-man swordsman who wants to become the strongest swordsman of Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Anime-original encounter that serves as a prelude to the Hyouzou fight.

keyMoments.title: Protects Robin from Hyouzou
keyMoments.description: Zoro intercepts Hyouzou's attack on Robin and prepares to face the steroid-enhanced swordsman.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the upcoming major battle and shows Zoro protecting his crewmate.

keyMoments.title: Nanasenmaigawara Mawashigeri Debut
keyMoments.description: Jinbe uses his Fish-Man Karate roundhouse kick technique to block Wadatsumi's massive punch and break his finger.
keyMoments.significance: First Fish-Man Karate technique by Jinbe that uses his legs rather than hands.

abilities.description: A powerful roundhouse kick strong enough to block giant-sized attacks and break bones. Also known as 7000 Brick Roundhouse Kick.

keyMoments.title: Defends Nami from Wadatsumi
keyMoments.description: Sanji kicks Wadatsumi in the head after Nami is blown away by the impact of Wadatsumi falling.
keyMoments.significance: Classic character moment showing Sanji's protective devotion to Nami.

keyMoments.title: Captured by Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Hody grabs Shirahoshi by her hair after slicing through her brothers who tried to protect her.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the critical danger moment that prompts Luffy's intervention.

keyMoments.title: Saved by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Snake Shot forces Hody to release Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy rescues Shirahoshi and begins his direct confrontation with Hody.

keyMoments.title: Energy Steroid Enhancement
keyMoments.description: After being manipulated by Zeo and taking an Energy Steroid, Wadatsumi defeats Surume with enhanced strength.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the immediate power boost from Energy Steroids.

reveals.information: Gains enhanced strength from Energy Steroid consumption

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken is defeated by Hody Jones who pulls his trident from Decken's body. Before losing consciousness, Decken touches Hody and throws an axe.
keyMoments.significance: Eliminates Decken as an active threat and ends his alliance with Hody.
